title: No YouTuber dares to box me after seeing this

comments.comment: sorry havnt uploaded in a while got sick  boo

I know Felix joked before that he is technically "retired" from being a Youtuber but ever since he moved to Japan all of his videos do feel like has retired, they feel like it's just him enjoying life with Marzia and the pugs and not worrying about content or anything else, kinda happy for him honestly.

"You're so rude to your audience"
"They like it that way"
He knows us so well

Each one of these vlogs are so heartwarming. The fact Marzia edits them and how you both record and it all looks so cozy and peaceful. I can't even begin to comprehend it, glad that we can watch these. Makes my day instantly each time, I already know I'll rewatch these vlogs time and time again just because of the happiness and peacefulness that surges from them and how beautiful japan is, and of course you four.
I know that he still gets sponsors for his vlogs, but he’s just basically retired now by sharing his new life in Japan.  I love it so much.
It's amazing how you can make us feel that "lazy hot summer afternoon" thing, cozy and nostalgic. I don't know how to describe it, but it's that Ghibli Feeling.

I've never really understood or enjoyed travel vlogs from other people, but seeing Felix relax and seem much happier here is just balm for the soul. Honestly since his honeymoon vlog I've really enjoyed these slower paced videos, and I love seeing the genuine joy he gets to have being there

Honestly, I don't watch Pewds a lot anymore like I used to years ago, but now, watching his videos it gives me the same feeling as it used to, a very brief, momentary feeling of peace of mind without any worries. He never missed to pick me up when I was down, and he still doesn't.
And seeing Maya and Edgar still living, and living comfortably is just bliss.
Damn, gotta say since I'm not seeing a lot of praise for the soundtracks and their maginificent timing, bravo to whoever edits these videos. It just makes it have that immersive ambiance.

Friend: "So rude to your audience"
Felix: "They like it that way"
Fans: "Used to it by now, don't even notice it."

its crazy seeing how much pewdiepie has grown up like lets go back a couple years ago when we were kids watching him make firday with pewdiepie or the amnesia gameplays like proud of you pews you honestly helped me grow up thanks for everything pews

This is like watching an insight into pewd's retirement, we all love the content and want to see him still make videos for us (selfishly) but also you can tell he is finally making memories and content he wants to make and he can finally enjoy his time with marzia in a place that feels more like home. he's done enough for the internet and enough for us as viewers, many hours of enjoyment and at this point its just nice to check in every now and then and see the man who made my childhood and the sole reason for my love of gaming truly be happy and be where he wants to be. Its inspiring, may we all one day reach this level of peace and tranquillity <3
Its really nice seeing pewds make content other than reacting and gaming. These past few weeks/months of pewds vlogging is really relaxing

It's delightful that we are getting updated in these Japan vlogs all the time on what Felix is up to; he's finally completed his chapter and will forever continue to inspire others in his own endgame.
i love these videos so much holy shit

"I like to think he may have at last found some small measure of peace, that we all seek, and few of us ever find." this is the feeling I get from this video. Contentment is what we all should strive for.
I love how surprised Pewds was that he destroyed that watermelon despite being in peak physical condition.
You can‘t imagine how much joy I feel when I see a new japan vlog. It‘s all so wholesome. My most favorite thing to watch atm. And I think we are all happy that you both are happy! :)

"You're so mean to your audience."
Felix: "They like it that way."

He know us so well

The main reason I love these vlogs is that Felix captures parts of Japan that very very little to no other vloggers manage to capture. All the Japan vloggers I’ve seen get pretty much the same mainstream things but that sunset? With mt Fuji? With the sunset on the sand? And the shrine?? It’s just one small example but he manages to get a very unique essence of Japan in his videos and I love it

Another positve side thing to how great these happy Japan vlogs are:
Reading about how happy it is making everyone else, and seeing others just being genuinely overjoyed for the success and peace Felix has come to. It's really nice seeing everyone just collectively cheering on these two great people having what they've worked hard for
Can't wait to see Felix doing more of this type of videos, I really like them.

each of these feels like precious memory not just for Felix and Marzia but also us all here...i feel the calm that so soothing whenever I watch these Japan Vlog feels surreal feels like I'm there with them.

I am so in love with Felix’s content. I found him years ago and I enjoyed his content so much. But there comes a point when you just stop watching a youtuber. However, with Felix, he always seems to find me and his content grows and follows the change the happens around it. I lose interest and find other things but he always comes back with something fresh which lured me straight in into a rabbit hole of his content. He’s probably not overthinking it and he’s just making content that suits him but I think he really knows how to grow and adapt to his subscribers which I think is what makes him special and different from others. He couldn’t have picked a better job in this life time.
As a Norwegian, I want to challenge you to a boxing match Mr Kjellberg. The winner gets to invade the losers homeland🇧🇻🇸🇪
Felix is so good at making the vibe feel like we're all just hanging out with him. It's always been that way, but these Japan vlogs are some of my favorite videos now.
I'm glad to see him finally enjoying his dream of living in Japan. I wish him well on this new chapter in life.

“Bet you wish you were here, but you’re not” 
“You’re so rude to your audience”
“… They like it that way”
He’s not wrong lol we’re happy you’re enjoying your life after 10 hard years of making ours!

Pewds is recording precious moments of his life to look back at when they’re older and we’re being given the honor to watch as it all happens. In a sense, we’re all being allowed to watch over them for the parts they want to share and for that, I give them my blessings as a stranger on the other side of the world.
I don't know why I'm crying but watching Felix and Marzia enjoying their life in Japan feels so heartwarming. Love it!
This is like those old VHS tapes of a family vacation. Pewds has captured the essence of 90's dad life.

Seeing Pewds and Marzia enjoying life for all it has to offer is so heartwarming and wholesome. I don't look at them an envy them, but rather look at my own life and look to appreciate all I have. These videos give me peace.

This content is definitely in his element. Everything comes across
So smooth and organic. Love the videos!
I’m glad Felix is living his life to the fullest now.
At 3:00 is like our YouTube "dad" finally relaxing after years of waiting and taking time for himself with his family. You deserve this Pewds!

Our boy is living his dream.
As an OG 2012 subscriber I could not be happier for him.
Congratulations Pewds, sincerely.
Thank you for these amazing 10 years.

To be honest these type of vlogs bring my spirit up every time and I almost forget about my everyday life or what's happening around the world. Thanks Felix for showing the good life to all of us fans.
How does one go from demented half naked guy wearing a bald cap and holding a hammer to something as wholesome as this?
I just realized I was smiling through the whole video, it just makes me so happy seeing Felix having his time in Japan
I love these videos of him and his wife and puppies. He generally seems to be happy and content where he is at right now. So happy for him

seeing maya has been giving me quite the nostalgia, maya reminded me the days when "fridays with pewdiepie" was still a thing. Seeing her this old is quite wholesome and make me feel old too. ahhh those days surely hits different.
I'm amazed at how far you've come, Felix. As someone who has watched you since your humble beginnings, I'm very happy for you and Marzia. Much love to you all and stay awesome!
This is definitely Marzia's style of editing and I LOVE it. Keep these vlogs coming, it brightens my day!
watching Felix for this long just makes me lowkey in the feels, i cant explain it but these videos feels like we are just watching a huge documentary from Pewds, its been a one heck of a ride huh?
Whoever is editing these blogs knows the Japanese retirement experience that we all wish for. So much happiness and so many smiles from pewds & Marzia make me feel warm and cozy ️️
The fact this man can go to a random stream and get in like an average guy is what makes this so wholesome. no wonder they love japan!
Felix seems full of so much life now, I’m so glad for him that he got to move

Work so hard for so many years, became number one for so long, retired at the top, and out here living his BEST life.
Proud of you and happy for you. Love these vids of seeing a young, "old couple" just live life to the fullest.
Felix is living the life he deserves and it's a joy to watch <3 Also, I love how he puts so much effort into the little things
Man.. time sure flew. I remember back in the day he was screaming “Barrels!” Now He’s basically retired and enjoying life. Brofist forever !
being a fan of felix since 2013 until now is such a crazy thing cause seeing him actually be happy and experience the things he always wanted to do brings such joy to me
Weird seeing two of my YouTube world's colliding. Seeing Aki, and Emma from Tokyo Creative was strange and exciting. Now just need an Abroad in Japan Collab and my life will be complete.
Felix is having the time of his life with marzia and his dogs, such a wholesome and chill vibe

These vlogs have genuinely become a favorite part of my week when you post them. I know you probably won't do it forever, and eventually become more private about your intimate/personal experiences in jp and life in general.. but we're so grateful that you share what you do ! We love you guys ! And it's so wonderful seeing your journey thus far, all the happy (and less than happy) moments  Even content like this inspires us. I feel like I've grown up with you, and seeing this part of your journey makes Ms so excited to get there as well, in whatever way that will look like :)
The other day a sad incident happened for Japanese people, but seeing Pewdiepie made me smile. Glad you are enjoying Japan!
I love pewds' Japan vlogs I really hope he doesn't get tired of making them
I actually look forward to these vlog style videos so much! They're just so chill and cozy to watch <3
I'm literally waiting for a new vlog everyday. Counting days until they drop a video. These vlogs are so calming to watch. Wish you good health and happiness Felix and Marzia!

Pewds ive stuck with u since the amnesia days and i just wanna take a second to just say I'm happy for you man I'm glad ur getting what u want from life and im glad uve always stuck around for us. u help make the world a better place to live in thnx pewds

i've watched Felix for almost half of my life (i'm 20). from the amnesia, surgeon simulator days, to dark souls, to minecraft, to now, Felix's content never failed to give me comfort. I don't watch him a lot anymore since I have less time to do so, but I just keep coming back to his videos. I remember going through a heartbreak and watching his videos made me happy. There were times too that I am at a low and his content picks me up. I'm really happy to see him enjoy his life and not try his hardest to squeeze content anymore. He deserves this. Thank you felix.

I've been watching Felix pretty much since the beginning and seeing how much he's grown makes me so happy, makes me cry. I used to watch him play horror games when I was a kid, thinking he was the funniest guy ever. Now I look at him, happy as he could be. Sure he isn't the over the top guy I used to love, but he's still the same guy from halfway across the world making me smile every day. After all his hard work he's finally gotten the retirement he deserves. It makes me think about how far I've come. While he's living his dream, I've been just sitting idly, my middle school and highschool days passing by. I graduate next year and I'm absolutely terrified. I've never really thought about what I wanted to do, which sure a lot of people my age don't, but still. Seeing Felix like this makes me want to do things I've always wanted to do. I want to strive to do things I'm pretty sure are impossible, but I'll try my best. It's ten months till graduation. No more sleeping in past noon, no more moping around in my room all day. I'm going to write the book I've always wanted to, so that maybe one day I can inspire people, like Felix has me. Thank you for everything Felix, now I'm going to write a book so good, that maybe it could end up on your shelf one day.
You DESTROYED that melon I am still shaking

I haven't been a regular viewer in ages. Since you guys moved to Japan, I haven't missed a single vlog. Keep up the good work. Love the collabs with the other J-vloggers as well (Aki and Emma in this one).
I got goosebumps at 3:02 when I saw you going through one of the most amazing childhoods of most teenage Asians. In Bangladesh, we used to swim and bathe at the riverside just like this.

I’m really loving these japan vlogs. They are so peaceful. Watching them gives me sometime to actually relax as I haven’t been able to for months with work. Keep up these amazing videos. Glad you are doing well in japan.

Girl: "You're so mean to your audience" 
Pewds: "They like it that way"
Us: Facts
I love this. Takes me away for 20 minutes from the day to day. U deserve everything Felix. Bless you
seeing him so happy in the vlogs makes me so happy
It's so great to see pewds in Japan. He seems so happy and these consistent vlog style videos are refreshing. Makes me wanna live in Japan. It looks so calm and relaxing

The past couple of years I have grown to stop watching pewdiepie due to me changing my likes and hobbies over the years, but this new video format are the types of videos I like to see. Thank you pewds. No matter how old I get for some reason you always draw my attention.
I love that he is uploading these cheerful, happy vlogs in the morning (my morning lol) right because it makes my day start wonderfully!
it just makes me so happy to see these two enjoying their life in Japan
Just when we needed him most, Felix smashes glass on our heads and drops a banger vlog

I am loving these vlogs so much! It makes me so nostalgic for Japan. I can't wait to go back one day in the future. Also seeing Mt. Fuji made me remember how amazing my host-mum is at spotting Mt. Fuji from like literally anywhere haha. She's from Chiba and can tell where Fuji-san is at all times like some Fuji-spotting-sensei!

When he was in the middle of the river it hit me like damn, that’s pewds he made videos that I watched after I got back from high school, or from work with soggy boots and just binged his scary play throughs to wind down and laugh

These Japan vlogs make me feel so happy for felix… I have been watching for so long I can’t even remember  all I remember is amnesia etc. pewds has helped through everything in my life from making me laugh etc it is so beautiful to see him and marzia flourish in Japan and life the lives that they’ve always wanted to live.
I look forward to these!
9:18 My man finally beat cocomelon
The joy Felix must have felt when he obliterated that watermelon is the same joy I feel getting to watch this wonderful chapter of his life :)
One of the most calming and happy video that I have watched in the recent times....idk why that was very very satisfying and made me calmmmm as hell in the middle of the night ... Love  u pewd

"I'm finally living anime life" 8:53

Smash Cocomelon

These vlogs are SO wholesome that wholesome doesn’t even do them justice! I am very grateful Felix, has decided to share these with us! They’re always amazing for the soul ! Thank you, Felix, Marzia, Edgar and Maya!

This is so beautiful. Like seeing Felix make these core memories makes me sad I don't have them but it brings me joy to see them happy. Ive been going through a rough time so to see others happy really helps. Thank you. <3
Who would’ve thought a year later the day he uploaded this he would’ve had a newborn, congrats man thanks for always being an inspiration.
These are now my favorite vlogs to watch. It feels like the Kjellberg family has found Home in Japan and I'm so glad for them.

Maybe it's because of the lo-fi or the overall tone idk but it feels like a nice and touching epilogue to his youtube career. Man finally fulfills his dream and lives happily ever after. Thank you, Felix. For everything. You gave me hope.
These vlogs genuinely heal my soul. I haven't traveled anywhere in 3 years since the standstill. Japan is looking really lovely sofar I simply MUST visit it at least once in my lifetime..

Seeing these vlogs make me homesick. This is where I want to be. Forever. But I’m stuck in a shitty small town so seeing pewds and marzia and the pugs here make me so happy. And just makes me forget about my irl for a bit.

I’ve been living in Japan for the last 20 years, and I just want to say that, Felix, you’re doing Japanese summer right! A lot of people complain about this heat and stay inside when it’s hot and humid like this. But you’re out taking it all in and enjoying it. Good on ya!  

That said, don’t be ashamed to take it a bit easy when it gets REALLY hot. ‘Heat exhaustion’ is a real issue here during the summer. Also, make sure to take in a little extra salt. (Drinking enough water goes without saying…)
13:11 I did not expected that. LMAO
This family seems to be really happy and it makes me somewhat proud to just be a witness of these wonderful windows into their lives.
2:04 those sunglasses are crazy
I am genuinely so happy to see that Felix and Marzia are so happy.
I get abit teary looking at how happy and relaxed he is. Loads of love to him and his family♡♡♡
Japan vlogs are so calming to me, i really love watching them. I just love watching how happy Felix is in Japan and i really like how he's "documenting" his journey for us!
felix’s videos just distracted me from the rest of the world, they feel so relaxing and comfortable. This is truly the life that i wanna live, a life of peace at mind and beauty wherever u go
Love the evolution of PewDiePie videos,from the crazy video gaming to these wholesome video,keep em coming pewdss!!

Felix seems like one of the most down to earth people on the internet. He seems genuinely happy doing the occasional video that he makes. You can tell how much he has matured and has educated himself. I love these Japan vlogs and hope to see more of them. Been watching since 2012 so seeing the growth is nuts.
I don't even remember how long I have been watching but this is just peak Pewds, don't want to presume but never seen him this happy in vids. Great to see :)
Aww the pugs are getting old I remember seeing them as baby’s. Also seeing Felix grow up too
